medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced approximately 12 hours of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain, which began in the epigastrium that morning and gradually moved to the RLQ. They report some nausea but no vomiting, and there have been no fevers, chills, diarrhea, constipation, or dysuria. The patient has had several past episodes of RLQ pain lasting about 10 hours, with the last episode occurring 3 months ago.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of stroke and coronary artery disease (CAD)
